def pnm.pathfinding.navigationMesh.NavigationMesh.findPath (   self,
  _start,
  _goal 
) 

output = self.getPointOnMesh(_start)
if ouput == None:
  return None
_start.y = output[0]
output = self.getPointOnMesh(_goal)
